snippet: The Dow wrapped up its worst week of the year, and the S.&P. its second worst, as investors retreated in response to poor forecasts from big retailers.
abstract: Stocks fall, closing out worst week of year for Dow Jones industrial average.
lead_paragraph: The Dow wrapped up its worst week of the year, and the S.&P. its second worst, as investors retreated in response to poor forecasts from big retailers.

headline.main: For the Dow, the Week Goes From Bad to Worst
headline.print_headline: For the Dow, the Week Goes From Bad to Worst
